page.title: 08Family Life- a Child's View
page.content: After surveying a number of adults, we thought that it would be a good idea to see how children felt about family life. Generally, the children interviewed were happy with the way life carried on in their family. One girl commented,{"I like my parents {because they are good to me. They care {and think a lot of me".} Another said,{"I think that children {should have parents to rely on. They {can give you love and comfort when you {are in trouble". Many of the chidren interviewed were worried for the children whose family life was not as happy as their own. All of them had been punished at one time or another, but none had experienced deliberate cruelty from their parents.
